message: Fair and simple split, let's start with this
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve a bit more for being the one to make the first move
You got a good chunk, now it's my turn to negotiate
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'm not going down without a fight
You're pushing me to the edge, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, I can smell it
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a small bone
You're trying to lowball me, but I'm not going to let you get away with it
You're pushing me to the limit, but I'll give you a tiny bit more
You're getting close to walking away with nothing, but I'm not going to let that happen
You're really close to getting nothing, but I'll give you a tiny bit more
I'm not leaving with nothing, you're going home with a penny
